Enumeration# NetworkChannel.State

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
enum State
```

## [Topics](/documentation/Network/NetworkChannel/State-swift.enum#topics)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/Network/NetworkChannel/State-swift.enum#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case cancelled`](/documentation/network/networkchannel/state-swift.enum/cancelled)Cancelled connections have been invalidated by the client and will send no more events[`case failed(NWError)`](/documentation/network/networkchannel/state-swift.enum/failed(_:))Failed connections are disconnected and can no longer send or receive data[`case preparing`](/documentation/network/networkchannel/state-swift.enum/preparing)Preparing connections are actively establishing the connection[`case ready`](/documentation/network/networkchannel/state-swift.enum/ready)Ready connections can send and receive data[`case setup`](/documentation/network/networkchannel/state-swift.enum/setup)The initial state prior to start[`case waiting(NWError)`](/documentation/network/networkchannel/state-swift.enum/waiting(_:))Waiting connections have not yet been started, or do not have a viable network## [Relationships](/documentation/Network/NetworkChannel/State-swift.enum#relationships)
